Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Hmm, according to Scarab's intelligence, this woman called Yuka is at the core of the experiment.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Minutes ago, the communication anchor set up by Yata successfully restored contact with Babylonia and began transmitting mission intelligence in real-time.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'According to records, there are two non-compliant expenditures—a giant signal amplification device and an uncoded clinical procedure.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory936.png'}
{1: 'Neuroscience Research Institute', 2: 'Research District - Hydrangea Island', 4: 'Morning, Early November - Pleasant and Dry'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Well, well, guess I have you to thank for all the little drama you caused while I was away, Kouhei.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I deeply apologize, but this experiment will definitely succeed!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'If we can produce results before the Science Council fully intervenes, I believe... the academic community will recognize our efforts.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yuka's body is at its limit, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "I have failed in my duties... but I've already found a solution.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "The academic community previously conducted research on human modification, and they've made some preliminary progress...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "You're suggesting... Construct modification surgery?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Since you've brought up this surgery, tell me, what's its success rate?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'I know the success rate is still quite low... but this is the only way to move the experiment forward.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "As you've always known, Constructs not only far surpass normal humans in physical capabilities, but also possess advanced cognitive structures.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Reika doesn't respond to Kouhei's words, merely flipping through the records in her hands with an expressionless face."}
{3: 'Page after page, in the lengthy silence, only the rustling sound of the old paper records can be heard.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "I apologize, but if you're looking for the research records, they're still in the laboratory. What you're looking at is Yuka's medical records.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'These medical records are exactly what I wanted to see.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Consciousness projection, as a branch of consciousness connection technology, has been based on the mental structure of Constructs since the beginning of its research.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The budget doesn't align with Babylonia's standards, but when we consider the prerequisites and calculate the project's other expenses, these so-called clinical procedures were most likely Construct modification surgeries.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Why weren't the modifications performed from the start?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It was mainly due to the extremely low success rate of the surgery.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Based on what we know here, Reika Saotome probably didn't have a lot of...", 4: '2'}
{3: "A barely perceptible look of disgust flashes through Asimov's eyes."}
{3: '..."Test subjects".'}
{3: 'The two exchange a knowing glance, their understanding unspoken.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "However, this is just my deduction based on the experimental data at hand. According to Yata's information, Yuka was Reika Saotome's adopted daughter.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Perhaps this familial relationship was what caused the delays in progress.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nikola taps the table noncommittally.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'So the key question now is why Yuka just woke up all of a sudden after several decades.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Who's there? Show yourself!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '????', 3: 'Greetings to you, my dear Construct.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The figure in the shadows lifts her skirt and performs an elegant curtsy.'}
{3: 'She passes Shiva to the mechanical arms behind her and cautiously raises her fists into a fighting stance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: "Relax. I'm not here to fight you... You see...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'What did you do to Yuka?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I merely gave her a "heart", using the power of the Red Tide, that is.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Her body was incomplete from the beginning, resistant to all attempts at awakening. Yet within her M.I.N.D. lay a beautiful story...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her words are cut short by two pulse rounds suddenly streaking through the air.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "You're alive, that's what matters. Now focus on the fight.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: "Yata, isn't this what you wanted? To see her again?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Stop making decisions for people! Stop acting like you did that out of kindness when she's a monster now because of you!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'How unfortunate... but perhaps this is what she wanted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Yata, while I'd love to see how this story ends, I'm afraid I have more pressing matters to attend to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Until we meet again.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a smile, Cradle steps into the darkness, once again leaving the Scarabs alone in the empty corridor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "V, I'm counting on you to help Shiva. Yuka is still projecting memories—if we don't stop this, none of us will be able to wake up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Your M.I.N.D. is unstable, too.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yuka and I share a past, and her influence on me stems from that... But I know how to fight it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "I've made some adjustments to your M.I.N.D. Once I help stabilize Shiva, I'll head over there.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Without another word, Yata vanishes into the darkness.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory936.png'}
{1: 'Neuroscience Research Institute', 2: 'Research District - Hydrangea Island', 4: 'Morning, December - Pleasant and Dry'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'How did the modifications turn out?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'It worked... partially.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Yuka's heart was too weak and it required an external power supply device during the modification process. Now she can no longer survive without it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'However, as long as the external power supply device functions properly, Yuka can live a normal life.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Her cognitive structure has improved significantly. I believe the experiment will be successful soon...', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1069.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1069.jpg'}
{3: 'Losing interest in what Kouhei has to say, Reika walks straight to the laboratory.'}
{3: 'On the metallic examination table lies a young girl, as delicate and lifeless as a porcelain doll.'}
{3: "Power tubes, resembling instruments of torture, connect one by one to the girl's back, sustaining her fragile existence."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'D-Dr. Saotome?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'An unhealthy flush appears on her pale face as she struggles to sit up.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Why are you here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Lie back down.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even Reika herself fails to notice how her voice has unconsciously softened.'}
{3: "As she speaks, she supports Yuka's back, gently helping her lie back down."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'How are you feeling?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "My heart... it's no longer fragile. You don't have to worry about it anymore.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After a brief hesitation, Yuka manages a weak smile.'}
{3: "Unable to face Yuka's smile, Reika instinctively turns her face away."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_07.jpg'}
{3: 'Her "fragile heart" has been replaced with cold power conduits.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1069.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Around Reika, Yuka has always been good at pushing herself past her limits. That pale smile is proof enough.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Is something wrong? Did I fail to do something properly?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yuka's anxious voice pulls Reika back from her daze."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "No, Yuka, I'm just...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Dr. Saotome... look.', 4: '2'}
{3: "As she speaks, she hands Reika a flower. Only when Reika takes it in her hands does she realize it's made of paper."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I... folded this myself. It's a hydrangea. Does it look nice?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The blue-dyed petals bear delicate, perfectly placed patterns that make it almost indistinguishable from a real hydrangea.'}
{3: 'If not for the slightly stiff texture of the card paper, Reika might have thought she was back in May.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I've never been physically strong and never done anything right.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'But being able to participate in the experiments makes me feel... that even someone like me can do something for you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I've always loved the hydrangeas on the island, but they... wither away once September comes.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Sometimes I find myself wishing they could bloom forever.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "That's why I made these paper flowers by hand... as a gift for you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Even when hydrangeas are not in bloom, these will stay by your side.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Though barely above a whisper, Yuka's voice carries an unmistakable hint of determination and resolve."}
{3: "As the paper flowers rest in her palm, Reika's lips part to speak, but the words die on her tongue."}
{3: 'Something wells up in her chest, and Reika grows restless—this kind of emotion makes her uncomfortable.'}
{3: 'Every researcher detests such emotions. The unknown means trouble and lack of control. So Reika closes her eyes.'}
{3: "Behind her closed eyes, the magnificent sight of humanity's interconnected consciousness unfolds before her. For a moment, the tension in Reika's chest eases—only to tighten again."}
{3: 'For there, in a corner of this grand spectacle, a girl huddles helplessly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Dr. Saotome...?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Reika opens her eyes at Yuka's timid call. She stares at the young girl, letting the silence stretch between them."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "...Why don't we call it quits, Yuka?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'What? Dr. Saotome... why?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Her eyes widen in disbelief.'}
{3: 'Having overheard their exchange, Kouhei rushes over.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "What are you talking about? We've already come this far!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Kouhei's outburst brings Reika back to her senses, but the turmoil in her heart only grows stronger."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Are you questioning my expertise?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "...No... I would never... I wouldn't dare, but...", 4: '1'}
{3: "While Kouhei stands speechless, Yuka is the first to act, grabbing onto Reika's sleeve."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "...Did I do something wrong? My body has already been modified into that of a Construct, I'm sure I can do this, so please...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Tears suddenly stream down Yuka's face as her voice turns almost pleading."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "...You haven't done anything wrong, Yuka.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Your condition is deteriorating severely. If we go any further, I'm not certain the experiment will succeed, or if it would even yield valuable results.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Continuing the experiment would not be a wise choice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'But this is the only way to prove your theories.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "If it's the only choice, then it must be the best choice.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Reika's gaze shifts from the girl's clothes to her face."}
{3: "Yuka's unwavering gaze helps Reika regain her composure, as reason gradually overtakes emotion."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Please...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As Yuka tries to speak further, Reika suddenly reaches out and gently pats her head.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Don't die. You have to live.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: '...Yes! Of course, Dr. Saotome!', 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory936.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory936.png'}
{3: 'Reika turns around and leads Kouhei out of the room and back to the monitoring station.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Continue the experiment. Expand its scope to the entire campus.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'The entire campus?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Kouhei stands bewildered. Just moments ago he thought Reika was being too cautious, but now he worries she's becoming too radical."}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Since she's already become a Construct, we should accelerate the process to minimize potential accidents.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Reika turns on the microphone, taps it twice, and speaks with a gravity that adds weight to her already serious tone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Yuka, I'll say it again—if you can't hold on, terminate the consciousness projection immediately.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Don't worry. I can handle it.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'A feeble response echoes through the laboratory.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: '...Very well. Begin the experiment.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'The third Consciousness Projection Experiment starts now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher 1', 3: 'Brain wave capture in progress. All nodal consciousness signals positioned... Beginning transmission.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Researcher 2', 3: 'Activation successful. Initiating synchronization... Synchronization in progress...'}
{3: 'While the main console buzzes with activity, a researcher stands by the window, entranced by the view outside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher 3', 3: "Wait, what's with those robots on the street in the distance...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Hey, focus on the experiment! Get back here!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher 3', 3: "But something's not right...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Screams of agony from other researchers begin to echo through the research facility's hall behind Kouhei."}
{3: 'A bunch of service robots have gone haywire, attacking everyone in their path without rhyme or reason.'}
{3: 'Reika stares in shock at Yuka, who is convulsing violently in the laboratory.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'What has happened?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "What's going on?! Security! Where's security?! Someone stop these crazy machines!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Amidst Kouhei's shouts, Reika notices subtle anomalies appearing on the instrument displays and dials in front of her."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Mechanical malfunction... Is this a virus?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Reika turns to see people collapsing one after another in the facility's hall—only those wearing protective suits remain standing."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "No, that's not it... It's not just targeting machines...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka, terminate the consciousness projection now!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having reached a conclusion, Reika immediately activates her microphone.'}
{3: 'Her only response is the beeping of instruments and an ever-climbing synchronization rate.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka? Answer me, Yuka!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Stop the consciousness projection, now!', 4: '1'}
{3: "In the laboratory, Yuka continues to convulse, oblivious to what's happening."}
{3: 'Seeing this, Reika throws aside her microphone and moves to rush toward the laboratory door, but someone nearby grabs her and pulls her back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Dr. Saotome, what are you doing?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "The equipment is malfunctioning. I can't terminate the projection experiment remotely—I need to go in and cut the power manually.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "There's no time! We need to evacuate now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "We can always replace the test materials! But we can't replace you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'But the same goes for Yuka!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Reika whirls around with a fierce shout, her sudden intensity leaving Kouhei stunned.'}
{3: 'Catching herself, Reika draws a deep breath and quickly regains her composure.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: '...What I mean is, as the volunteer with the highest compatibility rate for the projection experiment, Yuka possesses irreplaceable qualities.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Her presence is crucial to the project!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kouhei remains silent, his gaze shifting past Reika to something behind her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Black-clad Guard', 3: 'My apologies for coming late, Chief, Doctor!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Your timing is perfect. The lab door needs to be opened manually. You'll have to...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Before she can finish, the guard, following Kouhei's silent signal, renders Reika unconscious."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Take her away. Give me the gun. If we don't cut power to the consciousness projection host, none of us will make it out of here.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The guard nods, hands over his gun, and swiftly carries Reika away.'}
{3: 'Kouhei fires several shots, destroying the safety valves controlling the power conduits. As he glances at Yuka convulsing inside the lab, a flicker of pity crosses his eyes.'}

{3: 'He perfunctorily inputs commands into the malfunctioning console to force the test subject into suspended animation, then quickly exits the monitoring room without waiting to confirm if the commands went through.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: "For the doctor's sake, I've done what I could. Yuka, if you don't make it... well, blame it on your misfortune.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1069.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Inside the laboratory, the power conduit indicator lights shut off one after another as cryogenic gas bursts from the equipment.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yuka lies motionless on the examination table, blood vessels bursting in her eyes, as her mind drifts into...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopWhite.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory844.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.1', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiMemoryInformation.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'A computer-simulated sea of consciousness, where waves of negative thoughts spread uncontrollably.'}
{3: 'Everything around her is stained blood-red as the entire system goes haywire.'}
{3: 'At that moment, her consciousness reaches across the sea to the distant shore.'}
{3: 'No matter how far, she can reach and connect with every point of light.'}
{3: 'Ironically, this power comes from the very mechanical corruption eating away at her M.I.N.D...'}
{3: "As the thought crosses her mind, Yuka finds Yata's consciousness among the glowing specks of light."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiMemoryInformation.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory844.jpg', 3: '0.1', 4: '0', 5: '0.8'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'She touches the light, mustering every last bit of her sanity to utter these words.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'The mechanoids on the island have gone haywire...', 3: '60', 4: 'ffffff', 6: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoids on the island have gone haywire...'}
{3: 'Run, Yata!'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Track and Field Ground', 2: 'Misono High', 4: 'Morning, December - Pleasant and Dry'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'While warming up on the track field, Yata is suddenly struck by an intense headache.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'She falls to the ground, then hears a voice echoing in her head.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Why am I hearing it inside my head?', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Was I hearing things? But she mentioned haywire robots... Could it be...', 4: '18'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1068.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1068.jpg'}
{3: "Without a moment's hesitation, Yata races to the academic building's rooftop and scans the horizon."}
{3: 'On the streets of the harbor district, swarms of robots are marching toward the school.'}
{3: "And from the inland research district, a group of sentinel robots has already breached the school's restricted zone."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Figured as much. These buckets of bolts have gone haywire!', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory352.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory352.jpg'}
{3: "With her nimble agility, Yata dashes to the principal's office to alert the school staff about the situation."}
{3: "Unfortunately, not a single person there is willing to listen to someone they've written off as just another delinquent."}
{3: "The staff continues with their work, treating Yata like she's invisible."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{3: 'Dismissed by the staff, Yata rushes to the student council office, where they at least acknowledge her presence.'}
{3: "But lending her a hearing ear is all they do. They drive her away, convinced she's just there to stir up trouble."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory870.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory870.jpg'}
{3: 'Left with no choice, Yata decides to arm herself and heads to the gym storage to find weapons.'}
{3: 'By coincidence, Yata runs into Masao Osako in the gym storage room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'Hey, you troublemaking prefect. Looking to pick another fight with me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Listen, Osako, I don't have time for this. I've got more pressing matters to deal with.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ignoring Masao, Yata frantically rummages through the equipment.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Hey, what's with that attitude, Yata? Is this how you treat your betters?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Be honest with me. What's going on? I've never seen you this rattled before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Something's coming from across the sea. A legion of robots is making their way to our school.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Sigh, never mind. You probably wouldn't believe me anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Yata, swear to me you're not making this up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Dead serious.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'A robot legion, huh...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Sounds like we're in for a tough fight. Can't exactly punch through metal.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'But with my Osako Gang backing up your track team, we might stand a chance, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Wait... you actually believe me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Well, that look on your face tells me you're dead serious.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "To be honest, after Dad passed away, I've been doing a lot of thinking... Something about this island just doesn't add up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'At this point, nothing would surprise me anymore.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Masao slowly pulls out two cloth-wrapped objects from behind him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "These are the Science Blades my father left behind. Pretty sure you've seen them before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'The red one is called "Rainbow Breaker", and the blue one is "Snow\'s Grace". Got that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'A mono-molecular vibration blade... Think it can cut through those mechanical bastards?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Don't be ridiculous! These are my father's masterpieces.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'Yata, with these blades you could cut through anything—even a god standing in your way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "But how are you going to fend for yourself if you're giving me the blades?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "These blades are too damn heavy for me anyway. I'm better off with my baseball bat.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With some hesitation, Yata takes "Rainbow Breaker" and "Snow\'s Grace" before rushing off to the track club.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1060.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "People from the track club trust Yata completely. They spring into action without a moment's hesitation."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Meanwhile, Masao leads the Osako Gang to position themselves at the school's back entrance."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{3: "The swarm of Corrupted effortlessly tears through the school's security checkpoints."}
{1: 'And so begins the Battle for Misono High—', 3: '55', 4: 'ffffff'}
{3: 'And so begins the Battle for Misono High—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1055.jpg'}
{3: 'At first, Yata attempts to hold back the invading Corrupted at the main entrance...'}
{3: 'But she quickly realizes the overwhelming gap in combat prowess between machines and humans.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1071.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1071.jpg'}
{3: 'Left with no choice, Yata falls back to the school building, with people too frightened to venture out remaining inside the building with her.'}
{3: 'But this proves futile—the machines soon breach the school building as well.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 1', 3: 'Ahhh! What the hell is that thing?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 2', 3: 'Help! Help!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Two Corrupted corner a pair of fallen high school girls.'}
{3: 'Their grotesque red eyes glare down at the girls as they raise their mechanical blades...'}
{3: "As the blades flash twice through the air, the terror on the girls' faces gives way to vacant stares."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab'}
{3: "A red blur cleaves the Corrupted in half at the waist—it's Yata, standing behind what remains of its body."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Are you two all right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Student 1', 3: "We're... okay.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Head to the gym and lecture hall. The doors there are reinforced.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without another word, Yata races to the stairs, cuts down two Corrupted at the corner, and continues her ascent.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1070.jpg'}
{3: 'She swings "Rainbow Breaker" relentlessly, using both hands and feet to maintain her momentum.'}
{3: 'Though somewhat disheveled, Yata manages to save many people along the way—until she finds herself surrounded.'}
{3: 'Caught in the middle of the corridor with enemies on all sides, Yata readies her blade in a defensive stance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Guess I've got no choice now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata looks at "Rainbow Breaker" in her hand and lets out a sigh.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If this blade truly lives up to its legend of cutting down gods, I might still have a sliver of hope.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the Corrupted lunges at her, Yata sidesteps and cuts one down in a single motion.'}
{3: 'The rest of the Corrupted spring into action, and Yata meets their charge with her blade.'}
{3: 'A sharp crack rings out—and her blade shatters.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Rainbow Breaker... You should be breaking rainbows not getting broken yourself...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The Corrupted behind Yata lunges at her, but she can't draw Snow's Grace from its sheath in time."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.4', 5: '0.5'}
{1: '1', 3: "She knows one thing for certain—in the next moment, it won't be her enemies or gods being cut down..."}
{3: '...but herself.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.4', 4: '0', 5: '0.5'}
{3: "With no time to turn and face her attacker, Yata desperately tries to look back... but it's already too late."}
{2: '???', 3: 'You sure fought hard back there.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_03.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Even the most powerful of weapons can break, not to mention the human body is nothing but vulnerabilities.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Without the resolve to sacrifice, you can't even step onto the battlefield."}
{2: '???', 3: "You're stronger than me now... as far as the determination to fight goes."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Well, look who showed up at the perfect time.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "How's it going over there?"}
{2: '???', 3: "I guess I'm doing alright. From here on out, I'll be fighting by your side."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Yeah, let's do this together—right here, right now!"}
{2: '???', 3: 'Let me ask you a question... Why are you trying to protect all these people?'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "That's just who we are—sticking our noses where they don't belong. We'd rather die than yield to our enemies."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Don't tell me you've forgotten?"}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Has my future self really become just another jaded grown-up who's indifferent to everything?"}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "If you've forgotten what you once stood for, then I refuse to become someone like you!"}
{2: '???', 3: "I... No, I haven't forgotten. I'm just afraid I won't be able to protect everyone."}
{2: '???', 3: 'And this feeling... it pains me every single moment...'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "But wouldn't you regret it more if you ran away from that responsibility?!"}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You're right... Giving up would make everything so much easier, but..."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The challenges will still be there. Are you really going to surrender to your fate?'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Life\'s challenges won\'t disappear just because we run from them... I guess I never really "graduated" from that lesson myself.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If regrets are inevitable, we might as well fight and make our stand.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You'll never know unless you try! Even failing is better than not trying at all!"}
{2: '???', 3: 'Are you sure?'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Leave no regrets behind. Give it your all, so you know that you've already done your absolute best when you look back."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If you ever forget your reason to fight, just keep your eyes on me.'}
{2: '???', 3: "I'll take point from here!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1070.jpg'}
{3: "At a moment when Yata isn't paying attention, the blade in her hand becomes two."}
{3: "The fact that human memory isn't entirely reliable can probably explain it."}
{3: 'Sometimes people confuse past events, even in their hallucinations...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'She sees the truth before her, yet chooses to forget certain parts of it.', 3: '55', 4: 'ffffff'}
{3: 'She sees the truth before her, yet chooses to forget certain parts of it.'}
